answers.answer: I sounds like your lungs are large due to the COPD, and they are in a large sack, your heart is also in a big sack, so if they rub each other, this can cause it to be inflammed.  Something like Pleurisy, this s a sharp pain when you take a breath of cough, the main symptom is chest pain. It is inflammation of the lining of the lungs and chest. I would take some kind of anti-inflammatory meds.

question: I have what one doctor called pulmonary spasms.
